author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ERIN FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE BY FRIDAY...
summary: ...ERIN FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE BY FRIDAY... As of 11:00 PM AST Wed Aug 13 the center of Erin was located near 16.3, -46.6 with movement W at 16 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...ERIN FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE BY FRIDAY... As of 11:00 PM AST Wed Aug 13 the center of Erin was located near 16.3, -46.6 with movement W at 16 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Erin (AT5/AL052025)
